concept.title: Running the Engine with Generator Disconnected
concept.shortdesc: When running the engine with the generator disconnected from the battery, proper grounding procedures must be followed to prevent serious damage to the generator.

conbody.p: If you need to run the engine with the generator disconnected from the battery (such as during a block test or when the battery is removed for repair or recharging), you must properly ground the generator.

ul.li: Connect a wire from the generator terminal to one of the dust cover screws in the yoke
Two strands of shipping tag wire are sufficient for this connection
Ensure tight connections at both ends of the wire

section.title: Important Safety Warnings
section.note: Failure to ground the generator when running the engine disconnected from the battery will result in serious generator damage.
Never ground the generator through the cut-out.
